## Personal injury

## Personal injury

At Davczyk & Varline, LLC we understand the significant impact an unexpected
injury can have on your life.  Injuries can cause you pain physically,
emotionally, and financially. Whether you have been involved in a car
accident, motorcycle accident, workplace accident, or any other incident that
has left you injured, our legal team has the experience to fully investigate
and litigate your personal injury claim.  If you have been involved in an
accident, contact Davczyk & Varline, LLC for your FREE, no-obligation
consultation and make sure you are getting the compensation that is due to you
under the law.  No fee unless we win, guaranteed.

## Personal injury practice areas

|

  
​-Car accidents  
-Motorcycle accidents  
-Pedestrian injuries  
-Dog bites  
-Nursing home neglect/abuse  
-Product defects  
-PTSD claims

|

​  
​-Construction accidents  
​-Work accidents  
-Farm accidents  
-ATV/UTV accidents  
-Bicycle accidents  
-Slips, trips, and falls  
​-Covid-19 claims  
  

|

  
​-Recreational vehicle accidents  
​-Snowmobile accidents  
-Boating accidents  
-Semi-truck accidents  
-Wrongful death  
-Sports and recreational injuries  
  
---|---|---|---  
  
## CONTACT US FOR A FREE CONSULTATION

Are you ready to discuss your case?  Contact us today to schedule your free,
no-obligation consultation.  We will work to help you find a solution to your
legal issue.

Contact us today

|
